```css
// Property: compression
// Description: Audio compression to be used for the recording.
// Component(s): Ti.Media.AudioRecorder
'.compression-audio-format-aac': { compression: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FORMAT_AAC }
'.compression-audio-format-alaw': { compression: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FORMAT_ALAW }
'.compression-audio-format-apple-lossless': { compression: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FORMAT_APPLE_LOSSLESS }
'.compression-audio-format-ilbc': { compression: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FORMAT_ILBC }
'.compression-audio-format-ima4': { compression: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FORMAT_IMA4 }
'.compression-audio-format-linear-pcm': { compression: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FORMAT_LINEAR_PCM }
'.compression-audio-format-ulaw': { compression: Ti.Media.AUDIO_FORMAT_ULAW }
```
